smart_goals.description: Reduce fasting blood sugar from 195 mg/dL to below 200 mg/dL within one month through medication compliance with Glucovance and dietary modifications
Lower cholesterol levels by reducing trans fat intake and increasing consumption of monounsaturated fats and fiber-rich foods over the next month
Achieve and maintain HbA1c level below 7.0% (currently 6.4%) through consistent blood sugar management over the next three months
Schedule and complete a follow-up appointment with Dr. Gitner in one month to review progress on blood sugar, weight, and cholesterol goals
